skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
Constructed by the Celestial Court, this is a smaller version of the great construct in Wei-Jin.
The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.
The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Harmonic Convergence"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wind Blast"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wind Blast Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind Blast Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Curse of the Midnight Wind Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Curse of the Midnight Wind"
Overcast spell: "Curse of the Midnight Wind Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Curse of the Midnight Wind"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of the Midnight Wind"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Curse of the Midnight Wind Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Curse of the Midnight Wind Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Urannon's Thunderbolt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Urannon's Thunderbolt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Urannon's Thunderbolt Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Comet of Casandora"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Comet of Casandora Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Comet of Casandora Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Chain Lightning"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Violence is always the answer, even when it's not.
There's nothing wrong with being aware of one's capabilities - particularly when one is capable of so much.
Deception is frowned upon, but only if you're found out.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +35%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In a battle of wills, one must not falter.
Even Slaanesh would be unable to break this one's self control.
No being can kill what it cannot catch.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If knowledge is power, then this one is powerful indeed.
"The trick is to think two steps aheadâ€¦ and then think one step ahead of that."
This one could challenge an Ogre to an arm-wrestling match.
If there is anything left to learn about military planning, this one has yet to come across it.
Hardy and resilient, this being stands firm in the face of all challenges.
No arms have yet been forged that this warrior has been unable to master.
When the arrows are spent and the blades are all blunted, this perfect warrior can rely on their well-trained body to keep death from their door.
A place for everything and everything in its place. Live by this motto and Chaos will stand out like the proverbial sore thumb.

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 when fighting against Daemons of Chaos
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some may consider administration a tiresome process, but this servant of the Celestial Emperor knows that a tidy society makes for an efficient, effective one.
An inquisitive nature is only part of the skillset required for the Dragon's questioner, tasked with ensuring harmony prevails over Celestial lands.
